synergynetframework.mtinput.simulator
Class TripleFingerSimCursor

java.lang.Object
  synergynetframework.mtinput.simulator.AbstractSimCursor
      synergynetframework.mtinput.simulator.TripleFingerSimCursor

public class TripleFingerSimCursor
extends AbstractSimCursor

Behaviour: middle-click + hold with a drag then release to define the first finger and second finger. Hold shift to rotate. Hold CTRL to scale. Left-click to finish. Space for third cursor.

Author:
dcs3ash
